name: battery-batt-control
title: Battery-batt-control
description: This extension uses the batt cli to control battery optimization
author: vatsalsanjay

commands.name: battery-status
commands.title: Battery Control Status
commands.subtitle: batt status
commands.description: Gives the status of the batt setup

preferences.name: customBattPath
preferences.title: Custom Batt CLI Path
preferences.description: Provide a custom path to the batt CLI executable if it's not in the system PATH

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
